1.1.1.name: wordpress/protector
1.1.1.description:
Protector can hide on pages and posts part of the content, displaying an alternative message. The message can ask the user to "do some action" like click a link or subscribe a newsletter.

The hidden part will be revealed accessing the page or post with a special secret key you send the user, eg. after subscription.

See the plugin official page for more.

My plugins:

  • Protector
  • Post Layout
  • Post Layout Pro
  • Other Posts
  • Newsletter
  • Header and Footer
  • Hy
